::Shredder::

Shredder looks over at Mantella as she gets out of the CF, walking toward
her.

"You allright?" he asks.




On Mon, 30 Apr 2001, *Orchid* wrote:

> Mantella
> 
> 
> 
> (Mantella wakes inside a CR Chamber. She gasps and kicks the door
open. She runs and stands there looking around. She looks at her hands,
covered in dried blood. She looked around. The surroundings looked
familiar. She groans, guessing it's the Destron base. She walks a bit,
till sitting in a corner and quietly looking at the wall...)
> 
> 

--
